constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 71 (Monday, April 26, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. HUFFMAN:
H.R. 2842.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
This bill is enacted pursuant to the power granted to
Congress under Article I, Section 8, Clause 7 of the United
States Constitution.
[Page H2115]

latestAction.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

title: To designate the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 120 4th Street in Petaluma, California, as the "Lynn C. Woolsey Post Office Building".
